derivation: from G3739 (ὅθεν) with the directive enclitic of source;
strongs_def: from which place or source or cause (adverb or conjunction)
outline:
1. from which, whence
    1. of the place from which
    2. of the source from which a thing is known, from which, whereby
    3. of the cause from which, for which reason, wherefore, on which account
